xx.UI_CHALLENGES_HAWK_RUBBER_DUCK_DESC: Shoot all the rubber ducks in the level
xx.UI_CHALLENGES_HAWK_WATER_DUMP_DESC: <li>Eliminate and hide five targets in water.
xx.UI_CHALLENGES_HAWK_BONFIRE_DESC: Shoot the bonfire to start the fire and summon the cave dweller
xx.UI_CHALLENGES_HAWK_KILL_MICE_NAME: Are You Pondering What I'm Pondering?
xx.UI_CHALLENGES_HAWK_SHOOT_RICE_BAG_DESC: Shoot the rice bag to summon the pigeon lord
xx.UI_CHALLENGES_HAWK_ELECTRIFIED_DESC: <li>Eliminate three targets with electrocution within thirty seconds.
xx.UI_CHALLENGES_HAWK_SHOOT_BASE_JUMPER_DES: Eliminate the Base Jumper after he jumps
xx.UI_CHALLENGES_HAWK_HEAVY_BURDEN_DESC: <li>Eliminate the three main targets with the same supended object.
xx.UI_CHALLENGES_HAWK_GOT_A_LIGHT_DESC: <li>Eliminate the three main targets in the same explosion.
xx.UI_CHALLENGES_HAWK_FAITHLESS_DESC: Make the priest leave before the wedding ceremony starts
xx.UI_CHALLENGES_HAWK_BLACKOUT_DESC: <li>Turn off the lights in all rooms of the palace.
xx.UI_CHALLENGES_HAWK_KILLER_SHOT_DESC: <li>Eliminate Dorian Lang and Guillaume Maison with the speaker outside the art gallery.
xx.UI_CHALLENGES_HAWK_HELP_HIKER_DESC: Shoot the rubble to clear the path for the hiker
xx.UI_CHALLENGES_HAWK_DESTROY_PAINTING_DESC: Ensure that the painting is broken when the meeting in the atelier starts
xx.UI_CHALLENGES_HAWK_LABYRINTH_DESC: <li>Eliminate Dorian Lang and Doris Lee with the statue in the maze.
xx.UI_CHALLENGES_HAWK_WALTZ_OF_DEATH_DESC: <li>Eliminate seven targets during the bridal waltz.
xx.UI_CHALLENGES_HAWK_TOUCH_AND_GO_DESC: <li>Eliminate the three main targets while they are escaping.
xx.UI_CHALLENGES_HAWK_EXPLOSION_TIME_DESC: <li>Eliminate five targets in explosions within thirty seconds.

en.UI_CHALLENGES_HAWK_WATER_DUMP_DESC: • Eliminate and hide five targets in water.
en.UI_CHALLENGES_HAWK_KILL_MICE_NAME: Are You Pondering What I'm Pondering?
en.UI_CHALLENGES_HAWK_ELECTRIFIED_DESC: • Eliminate three targets by electrocution within thirty seconds.
en.UI_CHALLENGES_HAWK_HEAVY_BURDEN_DESC: • Eliminate the three main targets with the same suspended object.
en.UI_CHALLENGES_HAWK_GOT_A_LIGHT_DESC: • Eliminate the three main targets in the same explosion.
en.UI_CHALLENGES_HAWK_BLACKOUT_DESC: • Turn off the lights in all rooms of the mansion.
en.UI_CHALLENGES_HAWK_KILLER_SHOT_DESC: • Eliminate Dorian Lang and Guillaume Maison with the loudspeaker outside the art gallery.
en.UI_CHALLENGES_HAWK_LABYRINTH_DESC: • Eliminate Dorian Lang and Doris Lee with the statue in the maze.
en.UI_CHALLENGES_HAWK_NO_LOOSE_ENDS_DESC: • Eliminate all bodyguards after starting the evacuation.
en.UI_CHALLENGES_HAWK_WALTZ_OF_DEATH_DESC: • Eliminate seven targets during the bridal waltz.
en.UI_CHALLENGES_HAWK_TOUCH_AND_GO_DESC: • Eliminate the three main targets while they are escaping.
en.UI_CHALLENGES_HAWK_EXPLOSION_TIME_DESC: • Eliminate five targets in explosions within thirty seconds.

fr.UI_CHALLENGES_HAWK_RUBBER_DUCK_NAME: Ils vont beaucoup moins bien flotter
fr.UI_CHALLENGES_HAWK_WATER_DUMP_DESC: • Éliminer cinq cibles et les cacher dans l'eau.
fr.UI_CHALLENGES_HAWK_KILL_MICE_NAME: Dire qu'elles voulaient conquérir le monde…
fr.UI_CHALLENGES_HAWK_SHOOT_RICE_BAG_NAME: Plus on est de fous, plus on riz
fr.UI_CHALLENGES_HAWK_ELECTRIFIED_DESC: • Éliminer trois cibles par électrocution en moins de 30 secondes.
fr.UI_CHALLENGES_HAWK_HEAVY_BURDEN_DESC: • Éliminer les trois cibles principales avec le même objet suspendu.
fr.UI_CHALLENGES_HAWK_GOT_A_LIGHT_DESC: • Éliminer les trois cibles principales avec une seule explosion.
fr.UI_CHALLENGES_HAWK_BLACKOUT_DESC: • Éteindre les lumières de toutes les pièces du manoir.
fr.UI_CHALLENGES_HAWK_KILLER_SHOT_DESC: • Éliminer Dorian Lang et Guillaume Maison avec le haut-parleur à l'extérieur de l'atelier.
fr.UI_CHALLENGES_HAWK_HELP_HIKER_NAME: Va voir ailleurs si j'y suis
fr.UI_CHALLENGES_HAWK_LABYRINTH_DESC: • Éliminer Dorian Lang et Doris Lee avec la statue dans le labyrinthe.
fr.UI_CHALLENGES_HAWK_NO_LOOSE_ENDS_DESC: • Éliminer tous les gardes du corps une fois l'évacuation commencée.
fr.UI_CHALLENGES_HAWK_WALTZ_OF_DEATH_DESC: • Éliminer sept cibles pendant la danse des mariés.
fr.UI_CHALLENGES_HAWK_ALL_HEADSHOTS_DESC: • Éliminer toutes les cibles avec des tirs à la tête.
fr.UI_CHALLENGES_HAWK_TOUCH_AND_GO_DESC: • Éliminer les trois cibles principales pendant qu'elles prennent la fuite.
fr.UI_CHALLENGES_HAWK_EXPLOSION_TIME_DESC: • Éliminer cinq cibles avec des explosions en moins de 30 secondes.

it.UI_CHALLENGES_HAWK_WATER_DUMP_DESC: • Elimina e nascondi cinque bersagli in acqua.
it.UI_CHALLENGES_HAWK_KILL_MICE_NAME: Stai ponderando quello che sto ponderando io?
it.UI_CHALLENGES_HAWK_ELECTRIFIED_DESC: • Elimina tre bersagli tramite una scossa elettrica entro trenta secondi.
it.UI_CHALLENGES_HAWK_HEAVY_BURDEN_DESC: • Elimina i tre bersagli principali con il medesimo oggetto sospeso.
it.UI_CHALLENGES_HAWK_GOT_A_LIGHT_DESC: • Elimina i tre bersagli principali con la medesima esplosione.
it.UI_CHALLENGES_HAWK_BLACKOUT_DESC: • Spegni le luci in tutte le stanze della villa.
it.UI_CHALLENGES_HAWK_KILLER_SHOT_DESC: • Elimina Dorian Lang e Guillaume Maison con l'altoparlante all'esterno della galleria d'arte.
it.UI_CHALLENGES_HAWK_LABYRINTH_DESC: • Elimina Dorian Lang e Doris Lee con la statua nel labirinto.
it.UI_CHALLENGES_HAWK_NO_LOOSE_ENDS_DESC: • Elimina tutte le guardie del corpo dopo aver dato inizio all'evacuazione.
it.UI_CHALLENGES_HAWK_WALTZ_OF_DEATH_DESC: • Elimina sette bersagli durante il ballo nuziale.
it.UI_CHALLENGES_HAWK_ALL_HEADSHOTS_DESC: • Elimina tutti i bersagli con colpi alla testa.
it.UI_CHALLENGES_HAWK_TOUCH_AND_GO_DESC: • Elimina tutti e tre i bersagli principali mentre sono in fuga.
it.UI_CHALLENGES_HAWK_EXPLOSION_TIME_DESC: • Elimina cinque bersagli tramite esplosioni entro trenta secondi.

de.UI_CHALLENGES_HAWK_WATER_DUMP_DESC: • Eliminieren Sie fünf Ziele und verstecken Sie ihre Leichen im Wasser.
de.UI_CHALLENGES_HAWK_ELECTRIFIED_DESC: • Eliminieren Sie innerhalb von dreißig Sekunden drei Ziele per Stromschlag.
de.UI_CHALLENGES_HAWK_HEAVY_BURDEN_DESC: • Eliminieren Sie die drei Hauptziele mit demselben hängenden Objekt.
de.UI_CHALLENGES_HAWK_GOT_A_LIGHT_DESC: • Eliminieren Sie die drei Hauptziele mit derselben Explosion.
de.UI_CHALLENGES_HAWK_BLACKOUT_DESC: • Schalten Sie das Licht in allen Räumen des Herrenhauses aus.
de.UI_CHALLENGES_HAWK_KILLER_SHOT_DESC: • Eliminieren Sie Dorian Lang und Guillaume Maison mit dem Lautsprecher vor der Kunstgalerie.
de.UI_CHALLENGES_HAWK_LABYRINTH_DESC: • Eliminieren Sie Dorian Lang und Doris Lee mit der Statue im Labyrinth.
de.UI_CHALLENGES_HAWK_NO_LOOSE_ENDS_DESC: • Eliminieren Sie alle Leibwächter nach Beginn der Evakuierung.
de.UI_CHALLENGES_HAWK_WALTZ_OF_DEATH_DESC: • Eliminieren Sie sieben Ziele während des Brautwalzers.
de.UI_CHALLENGES_HAWK_BODYHIDER_DESC: • Eliminieren Sie alle Ziele und verstecken Sie sie.
de.UI_CHALLENGES_HAWK_TOUCH_AND_GO_DESC: • Eliminieren Sie die drei Hauptziele, während sie flüchten.
de.UI_CHALLENGES_HAWK_EXPLOSION_TIME_DESC: • Eliminieren Sie innerhalb von dreißig Sekunden fünf Ziele mit Explosionen.

es.UI_CHALLENGES_HAWK_RUBBER_DUCK_NAME: Donde pongo el pato, pongo la bala
es.UI_CHALLENGES_HAWK_WATER_DUMP_DESC: • Elimina y oculta cinco objetivos en el agua.
es.UI_CHALLENGES_HAWK_SHOOT_RICE_BAG_NAME: Que no se te pase el arroz
es.UI_CHALLENGES_HAWK_ELECTRIFIED_DESC: • Elimina 3 objetivos electrocutándolos en menos de 30 segundos.
es.UI_CHALLENGES_HAWK_HEAVY_BURDEN_DESC: • Elimina los 3 objetivos principales con el mismo objeto suspendido.
es.UI_CHALLENGES_HAWK_GOT_A_LIGHT_DESC: • Elimina los 3 objetivos principales con una misma explosión.
es.UI_CHALLENGES_HAWK_BLACKOUT_DESC: • Apaga las luces de todas las habitaciones de la mansión.
es.UI_CHALLENGES_HAWK_KILLER_SHOT_DESC: • Elimina a Dorian Lang y a Guillaume Maison con el altavoz que está delante de la galería.
es.UI_CHALLENGES_HAWK_LABYRINTH_DESC: • Elimina a Dorian Lang y a Doris Lee con la estatua del laberinto.
es.UI_CHALLENGES_HAWK_NO_LOOSE_ENDS_DESC: • Elimina a todos los guardaespaldas tras iniciar la evacuación.
es.UI_CHALLENGES_HAWK_WALTZ_OF_DEATH_DESC: • Elimina siete objetivos durante el vals nupcial.
es.UI_CHALLENGES_HAWK_ALL_HEADSHOTS_DESC: • Elimina todos los objetivos con tiros a la cabeza.
es.UI_CHALLENGES_HAWK_EXPLOSION_TIME_DESC: • Elimina cinco objetivos con explosiones en menos de 30 segundos.
